mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.caiwurenyuan_name as caiwurenyuanName ,a.caiwurenyuan_phone as caiwurenyuanPhone ,a.caiwurenyuan_id_number as caiwurenyuanIdNumber ,a.caiwurenyuan_photo as caiwurenyuanPhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.caiwurenyuan_email as caiwurenyuanEmail ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM caiwurenyuan a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.caiwurenyuan_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.caiwurenyuanName},'%')
and a.caiwurenyuan_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.caiwurenyuanPhone},'%')
and a.caiwurenyuan_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.caiwurenyuanIdNumber},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.caiwurenyuan_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.caiwurenyuanEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
